text: @Liz_Wheeler @realDonaldTrump Dems are slow-walking, opening up the economy during the Coronavirus pandemic. They allow protesting/rioting, but you cant go to church. They want to shut down schools to keep US dependent and will sacrafice OUR well being to gain power. This is a glimpse of their America.
